title: Design Leadership at National Geographic
content: I manage the user experience practice at the National Geographic Society, guiding research and design for digital storytelling.

title: Research-driven Approach
content: My background in UX research informs every project. I combine qualitative and quantitative methods to craft user-centered products.

title: Collaborative Process
content: I believe in cross-disciplinary collaboration. Whether working with editors, developers or photographers, I'm passionate about building teams that create engaging experiences.
